subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN5063 is on the way
description_text:

conversations.body_text: Hi Bruno Santos,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused and will look into this for you as soon as possible.

Thank you for your reply but its solved.  The next day arrived.

Many thanks

Enviado de Outlook para Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi Bruno Santos,    Thank you for your reply. This is most likely due to DHL not providing timely logistics updates.
